entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hide ; BEGIN METHOD / ; END METHOD from JitDisasm #89357
    8.0.0
  • Building iOS projects with AOT & LLVM enabled consumes all CPU cores and makes system unusable #89356
  • How should I debug the corehost .sln？ #89354
  • `LocalBuilder.IsPinned` always returns `false` #89347
  • EventPipe hangs with a shared NativeAOT library #89346
  • Empty .pfx certificates causes apps to crash after a while #89345
  • Invalid codegen for Vector512 arithmetic right shift operator (>>) #89338
  • Cross-gen failed to produce PDB for C# Dev Kit binaries #89337

Closed

  • JIT_CountProfile32 incorrect native codegen on linux #89340
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8 locals/stack memory alignment or "zeroing" behavior change? #89295
  • Consider increasing reservoir's size for GDV candidates #86837
    Future
  • IsolatedStorageFile.GetMachineStoreForApplication() not working on MacOS #89298
  • Publish error on wasm project #87622
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT produces very large `__LINKEDIT` segment on macOS #86707
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][eat] Multiple tests failing for `System.Runtime.Tests` #51912
    8.0.0
  • The browser-wasm SDK should automatically reference the threading/perf-tracing ref assemblies #72872
    8.0.0
  • Support wasm variants in NuGet packages #76959
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][eat] `System.Composition.Tests` test failures #56845
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] System.IO.Compression tests fail on windows/helix #52108
    8.0.0
  • ILC doesn't return an error -- docker build keeps on running #89332

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove --flat from default dsymutil options #89358
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Properly close malformed PKCS12 files when enumerating stores #89355
    area-System.Security
  • Fix EventPipe utf8 conversion methods to match between JIT and AOT #89353
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Have callee/callerSaveRegs() use an array based lookup #89351
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Have callee/callerSaveRegs() use varTypeUsesIntReg not varTypeIsIntOrI #89349
  • Avoid boxing in Enum.HasFlag in Tier0 #89348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify hardware feature detection between CoreCLR JIT and AOT #89342
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix Vector512 rightshift #89339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Do not show a pop-up dialog when an assertion occurs in SuperPMI collection #89336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SBLK_MASK_LOCK_THREADID allow tid up to 65535 (#88772) #89335
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Update PAL and GC `BitScanReverse` to use `__builtin_clz` #89350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set BaseSize of interfaces to 0 #89343
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix exe size for Mach-O files #89325
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove incorrect flag setting #88878
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2227617 #89321
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Replace GVMLookupForSlot internal cache with generic cache similar to CastCache #89331
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • FIX #87983 - Enable events for LogAlways #89326
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow multiple kmask registers to be allocated and cleanup some codegen around them #89059
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][ios] Improve Native AOT test coverage on apple mobile platforms #89301
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write/Copy, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add package readme for obsolete .NET Standard 1.x packages #88911
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use AVX512 intrinsics for number conversion when possible #89330
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Generates a guid for activity id #88838
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix minor documentation error for `IFloatingPoint<TSelf>.Round(TSelf, int, MidpointRounding)` #88458
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Allow reference types for pinned GC.AllocateArray() #89293
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter multithreading support #88279
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Optimize liveness fixpoint computation #89328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wbt changes #88370
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [IGNORE][wasm] CI for running wbt with multithreaded runtime #87895
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • [mono][wasm] Use [UnmanagedCallersOnly] in GetDelegateForFunctionPoin… #89334
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT createdump fork/exec for crash dump generation #89203
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #89311
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Ownership tracking #89329
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Codegen deficiencies in object allocator helpers #2353

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement more efficient null-checking and use inbounds GEPs #2348
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet pack --no-build does not pack StaticWebAssets correctly #34194

Updated

  • File used by another process #33956
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • zsh: command not found: dotnet on Mac m1 #22910

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix single-file static web assets tests #34186
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Containers: handle Basic auth, registries with non-Uri Realms, and registries that do not provide Service information #33753
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: list-patterns on enumerables #6574
  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • Higher Kinded Polymorphism / Generics on Generics #339
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: updates for builder methods #7370
  • Create spec for `in`/`ref`/`out` modifiers lambda params without type name #7369

Merged

  • fix links to spec #7368

Updated

  • Ref assignment switch expressions #7352

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `PENamedTypeSymbol` should override `GetMembersUnordered` with an efficient implementation #69169
  • Reduce boxing allocations of `ExtensionMethodInfo` in IDE side #69165
  • `SubstitutedNamedTypeSymbol.GetMembers` isn't cached causing 4% allocations of `SubstitutedMethodSymbol` #69163
  • Report rude edit when capturing primary constructor parameter and the runtime doesn't support adding fields #69159
    Backlog

Closed

  • Expression Evaluator incorrectly evaluating function parameters when the parameter is used in a closure. #69117
  • IDE C# "quick action" code generation deletes semicolon after block #69153

PullRequests

Created

  • Analyze primary constructor parameter captures #69174
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix setting name to be directly searchable #69173
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Cache extension methods on binder #69172
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Small simplifications in helper functions. #69171
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce cascading diagnostics on failed implicit conversion #69170
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache SubstitutedNamedTypeSymbol.GetMembers to avoid unnecessary allocations #69164
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce unnecessary IsApplicable calls during OverloadResolution #69161
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove mocks of setting services for unit tests #69160
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • C# EE: Fix parameter index #69149
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue where we were trimming the semicolon errantly from a class when doing override completion #69155
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix dotnet test SDK resolution when server starts as dll #69120
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix Color Color const field initialization accessing the Color type #68283
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Initial support for a set of analyzers/fixers to update existing code to use collection expressions. #69118
    Area-Analyzers, Story, untriaged
  • Reduce `TypeConversions` allocations by caching them in AssemblySymbol #69040
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce `HashSet<TypeWithAnnotations>` allocations in MethodTypeInferrer.Fix #69070
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Switch way from IVsService in option persister creation #69156
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Honor Concord's TruncatedString flag to reduce memory usage #68969
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WebAssembly misinterprets Content-Type on wasm file, uses slow ArrayBuffer instantiation #49587
  • Update JwtBearerOptions via DI after configuration when secret or issuer changes #49586
  • Extend support for user secrets and appsettings to use .jsonc #49583
  • direct communication between razor and js in razor files #49582

Closed

  • Typo in Title of ControllerBase.Problem() #44254
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Localised decimal type value cannot be set on input type number #49564
  • Reduce record usage in published aspnetcore projects #45859
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Draft: Support null values in Results/TypedResults #49588
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Reduce allocations from route matching #49579
    Perf, area-runtime, 8.0-rc1
  • Improve HttpContextAccessor debugging #49430
    area-runtime, 8.0-rc1
  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-rc1
  • Fix typo. #49171
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2227567 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SearchHandler for Android does not respect Shell Foreground color for Spyglass icon #16309
  • android #16306
  • [iOS/Mac] CollectionView is not shown when parent IsVisible is switched to true #16304
  • Panning MAUI.Blazor on touch screen cause random crashes #16303

Closed

  • Windows EmptyView different vertical/horizontal options when Template/View used #15152
    .NET 8
  • Windows Cannot click on EmptyView #15157
    .NET 8
  • Some properties not updating (eg VisualState setter not working for Button BackgroundColor) with AOT enabled #11662
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • Adds a null check to avoid crashing SearchHandler #16308
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16300
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [net7.0] Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value (#15512) #16238
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Updated

  • Document Element #16299
    area/docs 📓

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Should we deprecate the InMemory provider? #31335
  • The milliseconds of `DateTime` are lost when adding data seeds in database migration. #31334
  • Add an option to publish the migration bundle for NativeAOT #31332
  • Use interceptors to redirect the query to precompiled code #31331

Closed

  • 9.8 Critical CVE-2021-24112 Impacting Dependency #30909
  • Allow stripping away all model building code to reduce application size #29755
    8.0.0
  • Add a lightweight version of DbContext #19610
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add NativeAOT support to the compiled relational model #31333
